nodes.text: The Silver Fountain was a fountain located on the Plaza of the Catalan in Theed, Naboo. Because its jets of arcing water formed the shape of a mountainous peak that towered over those who stood at its foot, the younglings of Theed nicknamed it the "mountain fountain." After he was ostracized by both the Naboo and his fellow Gungans, Jar Jar Binks used to put on a clown show for the young refugees once or twice a day around the fountain.
